wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Bond (born Cornwall 1992) is a British composer particularly noted for his brass band compositions.

response: The band is dedicated to new music, raising the profile of the brass band genre and keeping music alive in Wales. They have an active commissioning policy and have performed works by many of Britain’s leading composers; John McCabe, Judith Bingham, Elgar Howarth, Edward Gregson, Alun Hoddinott, Karl Jenkins, Gareth Wood, David Bedford, as well as John Pickard. The band’s current Associate Composer is Christopher Bond.
Christopher Bond (born 1945) is a British playwright and theatre director.
